ComicInfo.Summary:
Kato orders the Hornet team to Hong Kong where they’ll need to break into the ultra secure National Bank of China in order to find the answers they need. But will they be able to pull off this daring heist without attracting the attention of the public’s new favorite hero, the Oko?
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Mike McKone | 1 | B | Cover B | Mike Choi | 2 | C/RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Edition Variant Cover | Mike McKone | 3 | D/RI | 1:20 Retailer Incentive "Virgin Art" Edition Variant Cover | Mike Choi | 4 |
